common_1090_system_01:
Do you want to press the button to disable one
of the locks on the Zero Lab?
common_1090_system_02: You heard the professor... Better press it!
common_1090_system_03:
Lock disabled.
Two of four locks are still active.

common_1090_friend_02:
You know that book [VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she told me to bring?
I think it’s got something to do with this place.\c
Or more like...everything to do with this place.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1090_friend_03:
But I’m not the one [VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she expects to fix whatever
all this is... You are.\c
I think you should be the one to carry it.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1090_friend_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Take care of it for me...
OK, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0006)]
